CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Check_In_Date__c < Last_Month_Start_Date_Formula__c , Check_Out_Date__c > Last_Month_Start_Date_Formula__c ), Last_Month_Start_Date_Formula__c , IF(Check_In_Date__c > Last_Year_End_Date_Formula__c , NULL, Check_In_Date__c))
CustomField.label: Last Year Check In Date Formula
